Générateur de jobs UGE

Un exemple qui génère 40 jobs MDI 


#!/bin/bash
for from in `seq 1 10 400`; 
do
step=9
to=$((from+step))

qsub -P P_bioaster -N "BCC${from}-${to}" -l sps=1 -q huge << EOF 

#!/bin/ksh

cd /sps/bioaster/pt6/pveyre/MDI_REVIVAL/;
/afs/in2p3.fr/system/amd64_sl7/usr/local/matlab/R2015b/bin/matlab  -nodisplay -r 'MDItest $from $to /sps/bioaster/pt2/anovoloaca/dataMDI/ /sps/bioaster/pt2/anovoloaca/MDI_LAST_RESULTS/; exit';

EOF
done

TRUCS & ASTUCES en VRAC

# Alias to switch between Open Stack tenants
alias os_htc setenv OS_TENANT_NAME "htc-bioaster"
alias os_bioaster setenv OS_TENANT_NAME "bioaster"
alias os_cc setenv OS_TENANT_NAME "ccin2p3"

Ditaa Possible tags

http://ditaa.sourceforge.net/

Not all shape selector tags are documented on the ditaa site. A quick source scan revealed:

tag Description
{c} decision(Choice)
{d} document
{io} input/output, parallelogram
{mo} manual operation
{o} ellipse, circle
{s} storage
{tr} trapezoid (looks like an inverted {mo} )
